BREAKING NEWS: Kobe Bryant's wife Vanessa has filed for divorce.﻿

BREAKING NEWS: +Kobe Bryant has a probable torn Achilles, according to the +Los Angeles Lakers.
He will have an MRI Saturday to confirm the diagnosis: http://cbsprt.co/AchillesKobe.﻿

ESPN ranked Kobe Bryant as the 25th best player in the NBA this season. He dropped 19 spots from last year, largely due to his Achilles injury.
http://www.lakersnation.com/lakers-news-espn-ranks-kobe-bryant-as-25th-best-player/2013/10/16/
PLUS: If you disagree with ESPN's ranking, and/ or COMMENT: What do you think about his ranking?
﻿

Read Los Angeles Daily News article on ASAS-LA Program Ambassador Kobe Bryant & his popularity in China. ASAS-LA Mandarin Language and Culture programs are referenced, along with quote from our organization's President and Executive Director, Ana Campos. #Kobe #Culture #KobeBryant #Mamba

Kobe Bryant plans to retire at age 36 after the 2013-14 season, when his contract with the Los Angeles Lakers expires, according to sources. Read more sports news on kalb.com: http://www.kalb.com/category/185180/sports﻿

Kobe Bryant has to be feeling good these days. Between being way ahead of schedule with his Achilles recovery and drawing massive crowds on his Nike tour in China (shown below), Kobe has not missed a beat this offseason.
http://www.lakersnation.com/lakers-news-kobe-bryant-is-enjoying-nike-tour-in-china/2013/08/05/
